thread.section_title: Hotel Jeanne d'Arc - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: My Friend was Right!
thread.title_full: My Friend was Right! - Review of Hotel Jeanne d'Arc, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Carol P
title: My Friend was Right!
text:
Stayed here based on my friend's recommendation and I was delighted with my stay! I asked for a high floor so I could look out of the windows at the wonderful rooftops of Paris. What a way to awake - to open the window and see Paris all around! I asked for breakfast in my room and each day they brought it promptly on a nice tray with all of my requests fulfilled. Comfortable bed and comforter, very clean room, helpful day and night staff - all in all a great visit! I would definitely stay there again. And I do love that they send the pre-visit survey asking your needs. When I arrived they said "Madame, all of your requests have been satisfied." They were correct. Thanks for everything!
Room Tip: I asked for a renovated room and it was very nicely done with a very modern bath. See more room tips
